list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add .editorconfig file and update project settings
This commit adds a detailed .editorconfig file to enforce coding style guides across different text editors and IDEs. Additionally, project-level configuration files under ".idea" directory have been updated which includes new settings for code style and version control system. The previously ignored files are removed from .gitignore file.
